More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Retrieve a list of Targeted Campaigns and their performance data
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Period Type. Applicable values:
Day
Week
Month
Last7d
Last30d

Note: The start date and end date must align with the Period Type.

","name":"period_type","sample":"Last30d","type":"string","required":"True","key":"YjTGfxw"},{"description":"

The start_date must be:

- Any day in the past three calendar months for \"Day\" period type

- Sunday for \"Week\" period type

- The 1st day of a Month for \"Month\" period type

- The date that is 6 days prior to the latest data date for \"Last7d\" period type

- The date that is 29 days prior to the latest data date for \"Last30d\" period type


Note: The latest data date can be obtained by using \"AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker\" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

","name":"start_date","sample":"20250801","type":"string","required":"True","key":"xZptYns"},{"description":"

The end_date must be: 

- Equal to start_date for \"Day\" period type

- Saturday for \"Week\" period type

- The last day of a Month for \"Month\" period type. If the selected month is the current month, the end_date should be the latest data date

- The latest data date for \"Last7d\" period type

- The latest data date for \"Last30d\" period type


Note: 

- The end_date must be later than the start_date and earlier than the latest data date

- The latest data date can be obtained by using \"AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker\" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

","name":"end_date","sample":"20250831","type":"string","required":"True","key":"NeBNAjb"},{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"EcFYCSm"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 20.

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"bTBJiCB"},{"description":"

Campaign ID for query.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"rQpjMGG"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_param","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"EbANbiE"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid period type","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BwQWKfE"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RYjnaGS"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"JDHFXwS","children":[{"description":"","name":"list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"BKCtrJG","children":[{"description":"

Unique identifier of the targeted campaign.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"25109087","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GxYTWTf"},{"description":"

The number of affiliates ever brought sales for the targeted campaign.

","name":"affiliates","sample":"199","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"rkTJpjh"},{"description":"

Total sales amount generated from this targeted campaign, in the market's default currency.

","name":"sales","sample":"4851","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BHscDWi"},{"description":"

Total quantity of the item sold through the targeted campaign.

","name":"item_sold","sample":"6","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"dBwyRGQ"},{"description":"

The estimated commission amount payable to affiliates from this targeted campaign.

","name":"est_commission","sample":"56","type":"string","required":null,"key":"brhphaE"},{"description":"

Campaign name.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"sysy","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JypeMre"}]},{"description":"

This is to indicate the whole number of target campaigns.

","name":"total_count","sample":"589","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"YcnxZ"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of datas.

","name":"has_more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"DXSBHmS"},{"description":"

Effective query date range. Invalid input ranges will be automatically shifted.

","name":"fetched_date_range","sample":"20250801-20250831","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RFjBBrM"}]}]}
